Html:
How many of you are active ??? Sorry, I've been caught up in issues with power / internet here in the suburbs of philly.... but, I am hoping to get productive soon ....

What is your background, guys ?

You know some about me but I’ll get this started because the others seem to be shy. :-)

My name is Scott (scorn) and I started the “Ascend.Net” project. I live in the U.S. I’ve been in Windows programming for more than 15 years. My first program ran on Windows 286. Not too many people remember that version. I work as a consultant specializing in .Net smart clients.
